author: Ribose#1243
name: Falcogs
description: Useful utilities I created for the Falcom discord, but anyone can use these ones here that are complete and functioning!
install_msg: Thank you for installing! These are useful utilities I made, and I hope there's something for you, too. Submit issues to <https://github.com/nmbook/FalcomBot-cogs/issues> or message me privately on discord at **Ribose#1243**.
